verses.verse: Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H347>Job<s%> out of the <S%H9370>whirlwind<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%>
<S%H4310>"Who<s%> is <S%H2088>this<s%> that <S%H2821>darkens<s%> <S%H6098>counsel<s%> By <S%H4405>words<s%> <S%H1097>without<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>?
<S%H4994>"Now<s%> <S%H247>gird<s%> up your <S%H2504>loins<s%> like a <S%H1397>man,<s%> And I will <S%H7592>ask<s%> you, and you <S%H3045>instruct<s%> Me!
<S%H375>"Where<s%> were you when I <S%H3245>laid<s%> the <S%H3245>foundation<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>? <S%H5046>Tell<s%> [Me,] <S%H518>if<s%> you <S%H3045>have<s%> <S%H998>understanding,<s%>
<S%H4310>Who<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> its <S%H4461>measurements,<s%> <S%H3588>since<s%> you <S%H3045>know<s%>? <S%H176>Or<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> <S%H5186>stretched<s%> the <S%H6957>line<s%> on it?
"On <S%H4100>what<s%> were its <S%H134>bases<s%> <S%H2883>sunk<s%>? <S%H176>Or<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> <S%H3384>laid<s%> its <S%H68>cornerstone,<s%> <S%H6438><s%>
When the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H3556>stars<s%> <S%H7442>sang<s%> <S%H3162>together,<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7321>shouted<s%> for <S%H7321>joy<s%>?
"Or [who] <S%H9353>enclosed<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> with <S%H1817>doors,<s%> When, <S%H1518>bursting<s%> <S%H1518>forth,<s%> it <S%H3318>went<s%> out from the <S%H7358>womb;<s%>
When I <S%H7760>made<s%> a <S%H6051>cloud<s%> its <S%H3830>garment,<s%> And <S%H6205>thick<s%> <S%H6205>darkness<s%> its <S%H2854>swaddling<s%> <S%H2854>band,<s%>
And I <S%H7665>placed<s%> <S%H2706>boundaries<s%> on it, And I <S%H7760>set<s%> a <S%H1280>bolt<s%> and <S%H1817>doors,<s%>

And I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6311>'Thus<s%> <S%H5704>far<s%> you shall <S%H935>come,<s%> but <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3254>farther;<s%> And <S%H6311>here<s%> shall your <S%H1347>proud<s%> <S%H1530>waves<s%> <S%H7896>stop<s%>'?

"Have you <S%H4480>ever<s%> <S%H3117><s%> in your <S%H4480>life<s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> [And] caused the <S%H7837>dawn<s%> to <S%H3045>know<s%> its <S%H4725>place;<s%>
That it might <S%H270>take<s%> <S%H270>hold<s%> of the <S%H3671>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> And the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> be <S%H5287>shaken<s%> out of it?
"It is <S%H2015>changed<s%> like <S%H2563>clay<s%> [under] the <S%H2368>seal;<s%> And they <S%H3320>stand<s%> <S%H3320>forth<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> a <S%H3830>garment.<s%>
"And from the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> their <S%H216>light<s%> is <S%H4513>withheld,<s%> And the <S%H7311>uplifted<s%> <S%H2220>arm<s%> is <S%H7665>broken.<s%>
"Have you <S%H935>entered<s%> into the <S%H5033>springs<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>? Or have you <S%H1980>walked<s%> in the <S%H2714>recesses<s%> of the <S%H8415>deep<s%>?
"Have the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%> been <S%H1540>revealed<s%> to you? Or have you <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H6757>deep<s%> <S%H6757>darkness<s%>?
"Have you <S%H995>understood<s%> the <S%H7338>expanse<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>? <S%H5046>Tell<s%> [Me,] <S%H518>if<s%> you <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> this.
<S%H335>"Where<s%> is the <S%H1870>way<s%> to the <S%H7931>dwelling<s%> of <S%H216>light<s%>? And <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> <S%H335>where<s%> is its <S%H4725>place,<s%>
That you may <S%H3947>take<s%> it to its <S%H1366>territory,<s%> And that you may <S%H995>discern<s%> the <S%H9350>paths<s%> to its <S%H1004>home<s%>?
"You <S%H3045>know,<s%> for you were <S%H3205>born<s%> <S%H227>then,<s%> And the <S%H4557>number<s%> of your <S%H3117>days<s%> is <S%H7227>great!<s%>
"Have you <S%H935>entered<s%> the <S%H214>storehouses<s%> of the <S%H7950>snow,<s%> Or have you <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H214>storehouses<s%> of the <S%H1259>hail,<s%>
<S%H834>Which<s%> I have <S%H2820>reserved<s%> for the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H9496>distress,<s%> For the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H7128>war<s%> and <S%H4421>battle<s%>?
<S%H335>"Where<s%> is the <S%H1870>way<s%> that the <S%H216>light<s%> is <S%H2505>divided,<s%> [Or] the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6921>wind<s%> <S%H6327>scattered<s%> on the <S%H776>earth<s%>?
<S%H4310>"Who<s%> has <S%H6385>cleft<s%> a <S%H8585>channel<s%> for the <S%H7858>flood,<s%> Or a <S%H1870>way<s%> for the <S%H6963>thunderbolt<s%><S%H2385>;<s%>
To <S%H4305>bring<s%> <S%H4305>rain<s%> on a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H376>people,<s%> [On] a <S%H4057>desert<s%> <S%H3808>without<s%> a <S%H120>man<s%> in it,
To <S%H7646>satisfy<s%> the <S%H9585>waste<s%> and <S%H4875>desolate<s%> land, And to make the <S%H4161>seeds<s%> of <S%H1877>grass<s%> to <S%H6779>sprout<s%>?
<S%H3426>"Has<s%> the <S%H4306>rain<s%> a father? <S%H1>Or<s%> <S%H176>who<s%> has <S%H4310>begotten<s%> the <S%H3205>drops<s%> of <S%H96>dew<s%>?
"From <S%H4310>whose<s%> <S%H990>womb<s%> has <S%H3318>come<s%> the <S%H7140>ice<s%>? And the <S%H9214>frost<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> has <S%H3205>given<s%> it <S%H3205>birth<s%>?
<S%H4325>"Water<s%> <S%H2244>becomes<s%> <S%H2244>hard<s%> like <S%H68>stone,<s%> And the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the <S%H8415>deep<s%> is <S%H3920>imprisoned.<s%>
"Can you <S%H7194>bind<s%> the <S%H4575>chains<s%> of the <S%H3598>Pleiades,<s%> <S%H176>Or<s%> <S%H6605>loose<s%> the <S%H4189>cords<s%> of <S%H3685>Orion<s%>?
"Can you <S%H3318>lead<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> a <S%H4216>constellation<s%> in its <S%H6256>season,<s%> And <S%H5148>guide<s%> the <S%H5906>Bear<s%> with her <S%H1121>satellites<s%>?
"Do you <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H2708>ordinances<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> <S%H518>Or<s%> <S%H7760>fix<s%> their <S%H4896>rule<s%> over the <S%H776>earth<s%>?
"Can you <S%H7311>lift<s%> up your <S%H6963>voice<s%> to the <S%H5645>clouds,<s%> So that an <S%H8229>abundance<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%> may <S%H3680>cover<s%> you?
"Can you <S%H7971>send<s%> forth <S%H1300>lightnings<s%> that they may <S%H1980>go<s%> And <S%H559>say<s%> to you, <S%H2009>'Here<s%> we are'?
<S%H4310>"Who<s%> has <S%H7896>put<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> in the <S%H2910>innermost<s%> <S%H2910>being,<s%> <S%H176>Or<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H998>understanding<s%> to the <S%H7907>mind<s%>?
<S%H4310>"Who<s%> can <S%H5608>count<s%> the <S%H7834>clouds<s%> by <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> Or <S%H7901>tip<s%> the <S%H9311>water<s%> <S%H9311>jars<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%>
When the <S%H6083>dust<s%> <S%H3332>hardens<s%> into a <S%H4165>mass,<s%> And the <S%H7263>clods<s%> <S%H1692>stick<s%> <S%H1692>together<s%>?
"Can you <S%H6679>hunt<s%> the <S%H2964>prey<s%> for the <S%H3833>lion,<s%> Or <S%H4390>satisfy<s%> the <S%H9130>appetite<s%> of the <S%H3715>young<s%> <S%H3715>lions,<s%>
<S%H3588>When<s%> they <S%H7817>crouch<s%> in [their] <S%H4585>dens,<s%> [And] <S%H695>lie<s%> in <S%H695>wait<s%> in [their] <S%H5521>lair<s%>?

<S%H4310>"Who<s%> <S%H3559>prepares<s%> for the <S%H6158>raven<s%> its <S%H9479>nourishment,<s%> <S%H3588>When<s%> its <S%H3206>young<s%> <S%H7768>cry<s%> to <S%H410>God,<s%> And <S%H8582>wander<s%> about <S%H1097>without<s%> <S%H400>food<s%>?
